# Scenario 1: Networks at equilibrium

```{r}
library(data.table)
library(igraph)
library(tidygraph)
library(stringr)
library(glue)

devtools::load_all()

library(ggplot2)
library(ggraph)
```


```{r}
# load files
files = list.files("data/output/", 
                   pattern = "Rds",#nopatho", 
                   full.names = T)
scenarios = str_extract_all(files, "scenario_(\\w+)_") |> 
  str_remove_all("scenario|_")
```

```{r}
# sanity check
a = mspathomove::get_networks(files[[80]])

ggraph(a[[10]], x = xn, y = yn)+
  geom_node_point(
    aes(fill = t_infec, size = assoc), 
    # show.legend = F, 
    shape = 21
  )+
  scale_size(
    range = c(0.5, 2)
  )+
  scale_fill_viridis(
    option = "A",
    limit = c(1, 100),
    breaks = c(1, 10, 30, 100),
    direction = -1,
    na.value = "lightblue",
    trans = "sqrt"
  )+
  coord_equal(
    expand = T,
    # xlim = c(0, 60),
    # ylim = c(0, 60)
  )+
  theme_graph(
    base_family = "Arial",
    background = "white",
    base_size = 8,
    plot_margin = margin(rep(0, 3))
  )
```

## Process network data

```{r}
networks_folder = "data/results/networks"
if (!dir.exists(networks_folder)) {
  message("networks folder missing; creating")
  dir.create(networks_folder, recursive = TRUE)
}
```

```{r}
for (i in files) {
  uid = str_extract(i, "\\d{10}")
  
  nt = get_networks(i, assoc_threshold = 5)
  
  save(nt, file = glue("{networks_folder}/data_networks_{uid}.Rds"))
}
```
